\documentclass[12pt]{clssty/uprmthesis}
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%% Adjust the two following length parameters until  %%
%% the left and top margins of the page are properly %%
%% displayed.                                        %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
\addtolength{\hoffset}{0pt}
\addtolength{\voffset}{0pt}
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%% DO NOT edit/modify/change anything below this     %%
%% point.                                            %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
\pagestyle{myheadings}
\setlength{\unitlength}{1sp}
\newcounter{textheight}
\newcounter{textwidth}
\newcounter{headsep}
\newcounter{headheight}
\newcounter{dimension}
\setcounter{textheight}{\textheight}
\setcounter{dimension}{\textheight}
\addtocounter{dimension}{\footskip}
\setcounter{textwidth}{\textwidth}
\setcounter{headsep}{\headsep}
\setcounter{headheight}{\headheight}
\setlength{\parindent}{0pt}
\begin{document}
\hspace*{1in}\vspace*{-\baselineskip}\vspace*{-\topskip} \\
\begin{picture}(0,0)
\put(0,\value{headsep}){%
     \framebox(\value{textwidth},\value{headheight}){}}
\put(0,-\value{textheight}){%
     \framebox(\value{textwidth},\value{textheight}){}}
\put(0,-\value{dimension}){\line(1,0){\value{textwidth}}}
\end{picture}

\vfill
\mbox{}\hfill
\begin{minipage}{0.5\textwidth}
The current value of \verb=\hoffset= is \the\hoffset \\
The current value of \verb=\voffset= is \the\voffset \\[1.0in]
Adjust \verb=\hoffset= until the left edge of this box is 1.5~inches
from the left edge of the page. Adjust \verb=\voffset= until the top
edge of this box is 1.0~inch from the top edge of the page.
\end{minipage}
\hfill\mbox{}
\vfill
\mbox{}
\end{document}
